<rule id="springboot-web-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <!-- Spring component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-web" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring Boot component declared in source code condition -->
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-boot-starter-web" groupId="org.springframework.boot"/>
                    </project>
                    <!-- Spring component in compiled application condition -->
                    <dependency artifactId="spring-web" groupId="org.springframework"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Spring Web artifact with Quarkus 'spring-web' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the Spring Web artifact with Quarkus `spring-web` extension

                        Spring Web is a spring-web artifact brought transitively by any `org.springframework:spring-web*` dependency  
                        Add Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-spring-web`  
                        
                        Starting with Quarkus version 2.5, the underlying JAX-RS engine must be chosen. For performance reasons,
                        the `quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson` dependency should be used.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/spring-web" title="Quarkus Spring Web Guide"/>
                    <link href="https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Migration-Guide-2.5#spring-web" title="Quarkus Migration Guide 2.5"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
